Home.Title About Section: Choicie is a universal menu for all restaurants
Home.First paragraph: Foreign language names are no longer a problem.
Home.Second paragraph: Try new dishes when you travel or just go outside — with Choicie, you can order anything using automatic menu translation pictures of dishes. Place your order on the way to the restaurant, then just show the QR-code to the waiter.
Home.Fourth paragraph: For those who love food! Become an Influencer: add new restaurants to the city map, earn points, get followers.
Home.Fifth paragraph: Keep private important ordering information in your account: mark the dishes you liked and didn't like, and the foods you're allergic to.
